Submodules

agent.random.random_policy_rectangular module

Random policy for the rectangular dummy environment.

agent.random.random_policy_rectangular.random_policy(valid_actions: list) → Tuple[int, int]

A random policy that returns a random action from the action space.

Parameters

valid_actions (list) – List of valid actions.

Returns

The randomly samplLd action.

Return type

tuple([int,int])

agent.random.random_policy_rectangular.simulate(env: environment.dummy_env_rectangular.DummyPlacementEnv, policy, n_episodes: int = 1000) → list

Simulates a policy in the dummy environment.

Parameters

  • env (gym.Env) – The environment.

  • policy (function) – The policy

  • n_episodes (int) – Number of episodes to simulate.

Returns

List of episode rewards.

Return type

list
